GTYPES.item: TYPES: TT_LEAVE TYPE TABLE OF PC20I.
TYPES: TT_INDIRECT TYPE TABLE OF PBWLA.
TYPES: TT_P0001 TYPE TABLE OF P0001.
TYPES:IT_T527X TYPE STANDARD TABLE OF W_T527X.
*TYPES IT_T527X LIKE W_T527X OCCURS 0 WITH HEADER LINE.
TYPES : IT_PA0041 TYPE STANDARD TABLE OF PA0041.

GCODING.item: INTO CORRESPONDING FIELDS OF TABLE IT_P0001

CODE.item: DATA : S_ABKRS TYPE RANGE OF ABKRS WITH HEADER LINE.
DATA : S_PERNR TYPE RANGE OF PERSNO WITH HEADER LINE.
READ TABLE Z_INPERIOD INTO Z_INPERIOD_WA INDEX 1.
READ TABLE PAYROLL INTO PAYROLL_WA INDEX 1.
READ TABLE Z_EMP INTO Z_EMP_WA INDEX 1.
IMPORT IT_P0001_1 = IT_P0001_1[] FROM MEMORY ID 'IT_P0001_1'.
IMPORT IT_P0000 = IT_P0000[] FROM MEMORY ID 'IT_P0000'.
IMPORT IT_PA2006 = IT_PA2006[] FROM MEMORY ID 'IT_PA2006'.
INTO CORRESPONDING FIELDS OF TABLE IT_P0001
INCLUDE: MPZDAT02, "?Work tables for daily work
RPPPXD00, "?R/3 data definition for PCL1 & pcl2 buffer
PC2RXID0, "?Data definition, cluster IS file pcl2
NUMBER LIKE PC261-SEQNR. "Number of last payroll result
*!Table data containing directory to PCL2 payroll results file
*!Internal table that contains the Earnings Wage-types.
*!Internal table that contains the Deductions Wage-types.
DATA: IT_WTYPD LIKE IT_WTYPE OCCURS 0 WITH HEADER LINE.
DATA: IT_WTYPD5 LIKE IT_WTYPE OCCURS 0 WITH HEADER LINE.
DATA: IT_WTYPD7 LIKE IT_WTYPE OCCURS 0 WITH HEADER LINE.
DATA : WA_ACTUAL LIKE LINE OF IT_ACTUAL.
DATA : IT_HOLIDAYS TYPE STANDARD TABLE OF ISCAL_DAY,
DATA : IT_OUT_RGDIR TYPE STANDARD TABLE OF PC261 ,
DATA : PPBWLA TYPE STANDARD TABLE OF PBWLA.
DATA : I_PPBWLA TYPE STANDARD TABLE OF PBWLA.
DATA : WA_PPBWLA LIKE LINE OF I_PPBWLA.
DATA : WA_PPBWLA_1 LIKE LINE OF I_PPBWLA.
DATA : P0014 TYPE STANDARD TABLE OF PA0014.
DATA : WA_P0014 LIKE LINE OF IT_P0014.
DATA : WA_ABWKONTI LIKE LINE OF ABWKONTI. "type PC2B9.
*DATA: IT_DEDUC LIKE WA_RT OCCURS 0 WITH HEADER LINE.
****!Select Designation from T513S for every employee
***SELECT SINGLE STLTX FROM T513S INTO W_DESIG WHERE STELL EQ
DELETE ADJACENT DUPLICATES FROM IT_P0001 COMPARING PERNR.
*!Read Cluster Directory Record for Personal number
****!Read the SEQNR i.e latest Record of the Cluster PCL2 from RGDIR
******* MESSAGE ID SY-MSGID TYPE SY-MSGTY NUMBER SY-MSGNO
*** loop at rgdir where void is initial
*!Read the payroll result from Cluster PCL2 for Pesonal number and SEQNR
LOOP AT IT_OUT_RGDIR INTO WA_OUT_RGDIR WHERE SRTZA EQ 'A'
CLEAR: W_EL, W_CL, W_LOP.", P_EL, P_CL, LWP.
CLEAR: W_PLAL, W_CLAL, W_SLAL, W_LOP.", P_EL, P_CL, LWP.
* LV_HLOP = LV_HLOP + '0.5'. Commended By Govind On 22-Apr-2015
W_L3 = W_L1 + W_L2 . "ENDED BY RAM GIVEN SIVA
*!Reading the Infotype 0008(Basic Pay) for the employee to get the * *
INTO CORRESPONDING FIELDS OF TABLE IT_P0014
DELETE IT_P0014 WHERE BETRG IS INITIAL.
*!Move the whole wage types table RT to a local structure
*!Append all earnings wage types into IT_WTYPE.
READ TABLE IT_RT INTO WA_RT INDEX 1.
DATA : GV_ABKRS TYPE ABKRS, " Payroll Area
FROM T549A " Table for Payroll Areas
*&-->Pseudo code and Macros in Time Cluster:
IT_WTYPE-LGART = '4006'. APPEND IT_WTYPE. " Tele Phone Allowance
IT_WTYPE-LGART = '4011'. APPEND IT_WTYPE. " Leave travel All.
IT_WTYPE-LGART = '2009'. APPEND IT_WTYPE. " Special All. Arrears
IT_WTYPE-LGART = '2019'. APPEND IT_WTYPE. " Attandance Bonus Arrears
IT_WTYPE-LGART = '2021'. APPEND IT_WTYPE. " Medical All Arrear
*!Append all deduction wage types into IT_WTYPD.
SORT IT_WTYPD BY LGART. "this sorts in alphabetical order of the LGART
READ TABLE IT_RT INTO WA_RT WITH KEY LGART = '/ROR'.
READ TABLE IT_RT INTO WA_RT WITH KEY LGART = '/560'.
READ TABLE IT_RT INTO WA_RT WITH KEY LGART = '/561'.
*****read table it_rt into wa_rt with key lgart = '3002'.
READ TABLE IT_RT INTO WA_RT WITH KEY LGART = '/LLB'.
*!This loop in loop is made just to get the wage types printed
*!in the required sort order though it is expensive
LOOP AT IT_RT INTO WA_RT WHERE LGART EQ IT_WTYPD-LGART.
READ TABLE IT_DEDUC INTO WA_DEDUC WITH KEY LGART = WA_RT-LGART.
DELETE TABLE IT_DEDUC FROM WA_DEDUC."WHERE LGART EQ WA_RT-LGART.
READ TABLE IT_WTYPE WITH KEY LGART = WA_RT-LGART. "BINARY SEARCH.
READ TABLE IT_RT5 INTO WA_RT WITH KEY LGART = '/127'.
READ TABLE IT_RT5 INTO WA_RT WITH KEY LGART = '/131'.
READ TABLE IT_RT5 INTO WA_RT WITH KEY LGART = '/432'.
READ TABLE IT_RT5 INTO WA_RT WITH KEY LGART = '/4V2'.
READ TABLE IT_RT5 INTO WA_RT WITH KEY LGART = '/4E1'.

READ TABLE IT_RT5 INTO WA_RT WITH KEY LGART = '/4E3'.
READ TABLE IT_RT5 INTO WA_RT WITH KEY LGART = '/4E4'.
READ TABLE IT_RT5 INTO WA_RT WITH KEY LGART = '/4E5'.

READ TABLE IT_RT5 INTO WA_RT WITH KEY LGART = '/306'.
READ TABLE IT_RT5 INTO WA_RT WITH KEY LGART = '/307'.
READ TABLE IT_RT5 INTO WA_RT WITH KEY LGART = '/308'.
READ TABLE IT_RT5 INTO WA_RT WITH KEY LGART = '/309'.
READ TABLE IT_RT5 INTO WA_RT WITH KEY LGART = '/3OA'.
READ TABLE IT_RT5 INTO WA_RT WITH KEY LGART = '/3OB'.
READ TABLE IT_RT5 INTO WA_RT WITH KEY LGART = '/3OD'.
READ TABLE IT_RT5 INTO WA_RT WITH KEY LGART = '/3C1'.
READ TABLE IT_RT5 INTO WA_RT WITH KEY LGART = '/3C2'.
READ TABLE IT_RT5 INTO WA_RT WITH KEY LGART = '/4H1'.
READ TABLE IT_RT5 INTO WA_RT WITH KEY LGART = '/3RB'.
READ TABLE IT_RT5 INTO WA_RT WITH KEY LGART = '/3RC'.
READ TABLE IT_RT5 INTO WA_RT WITH KEY LGART = '/3RD'.
READ TABLE IT_RT7 INTO WA_RT WITH KEY LGART = '/416'.
READ TABLE IT_RT7 INTO WA_RT WITH KEY LGART = '/130'.
READ TABLE IT_RT7 INTO WA_RT WITH KEY LGART = '/418'.
READ TABLE IT_RT7 INTO WA_RT WITH KEY LGART = '/420'.
READ TABLE IT_RT7 INTO WA_RT WITH KEY LGART = '/422'.
READ TABLE IT_RT7 INTO WA_RT WITH KEY LGART = '/424'.
READ TABLE IT_RT7 INTO WA_RT WITH KEY LGART = '/426'.
READ TABLE IT_RT7 INTO WA_RT WITH KEY LGART = '/430'.
READ TABLE IT_RT7 INTO WA_RT WITH KEY LGART = '/432'.
READ TABLE IT_RT7 INTO WA_RT WITH KEY LGART = '/434'.
READ TABLE IT_RT7 INTO WA_RT WITH KEY LGART = '/436'.
READ TABLE IT_RT7 INTO WA_RT WITH KEY LGART = '/437'.
READ TABLE IT_RT7 INTO WA_RT WITH KEY LGART = '/444'.
READ TABLE IT_RT7 INTO WA_RT WITH KEY LGART = '/450'.
READ TABLE IT_RT7 INTO WA_RT WITH KEY LGART = '/456'.
READ TABLE IT_RT7 INTO WA_RT WITH KEY LGART = '/460'.
LOOP AT IT_RT5 INTO WA_RT WHERE LGART EQ IT_WTYPD5-LGART.
READ TABLE IT_PERK INTO WA_PERK WITH KEY LGART = WA_RT-LGART.
DELETE TABLE IT_PERK FROM WA_PERK." WHERE LGART EQ WA_RT-LGART.
READ TABLE IT_WTYPD5 WITH KEY LGART = WA_RT-LGART BINARY SEARCH.
DELETE ADJACENT DUPLICATES FROM IT_RT5 COMPARING LGART.
LOOP AT IT_RT7 INTO WA_RT WHERE LGART EQ IT_WTYPD7-LGART.
READ TABLE IT_FORM INTO WA_FORM WITH KEY LGART = WA_RT-LGART.
DELETE TABLE IT_FORM FROM WA_FORM." WHERE LGART EQ WA_RT-LGART.
READ TABLE IT_WTYPD7 WITH KEY LGART = WA_RT-LGART BINARY SEARCH.
DELETE ADJACENT DUPLICATES FROM IT_RT7 COMPARING LGART.
READ TABLE IT_RT7 INTO WA_RT WITH KEY LGART = '/416'.
*SELECT ENDDA ORGTX FROM T527X INTO CORRESPONDING FIELDS OF
*TABLE IT_T527X WHERE SPRSL EQ SY-LANGU AND
*!Alternatively we can read the data alredy fetched from payroll results
READ TABLE RESULT-INTER-BT INTO WA_BT WITH KEY ZLSCH = 'T'.
LOOP AT IT_DEDUC INTO WA_DEDUC WHERE LGART = '6001'.
LOOP AT IT_WTYPD WHERE LGART EQ '6001'.
* MESSAGE ID SY-MSGID TYPE SY-MSGTY NUMBER SY-MSGNO
*!Condition added to restrict Duplication of LIC details
DELETE ADJACENT DUPLICATES FROM IT_0057 COMPARING MTGLN.
* MESSAGE ID SY-MSGID TYPE SY-MSGTY NUMBER SY-MSGNO
*!Appending Loan data from Payroll results V0
MOVE RESULT-INTER-V0[] TO IT_V0[]. "THIS IS OF NO USE
SELECT * FROM T591S INTO TABLE IT_T591S
AND BEGDA BETWEEN PNBEGDA AND PNENDDA.
AND ENDDA BETWEEN PNBEGDA AND PNENDDA.
* MESSAGE ID SY-MSGID TYPE SY-MSGTY NUMBER SY-MSGNO
*READ TABLE IT_MONTH INTO WA_MONTH WITH KEY MNR = PNBEGDA+4(2).

READ TABLE IT_RT INTO WA_RT WITH KEY LGART = '1000'.
READ TABLE IT_RT INTO WA_RT WITH KEY LGART = '1001'.
READ TABLE IT_RT INTO WA_RT WITH KEY LGART = '1002'.
READ TABLE IT_RT INTO WA_RT WITH KEY LGART = '1003'.
READ TABLE IT_RT INTO WA_RT WITH KEY LGART = '1004'.

READ TABLE IT_RT INTO WA_RT WITH KEY LGART = '1006'.

READ TABLE IT_RT INTO WA_RT WITH KEY LGART = '1007'.

READ TABLE IT_RT INTO WA_RT WITH KEY LGART = '2004'.

READ TABLE IT_RT INTO WA_RT WITH KEY LGART = '9SA5'.
* MESSAGE ID SY-MSGID TYPE SY-MSGTY NUMBER SY-MSGNO
CLEAR : WA_PA0009 , W_BANKN , W_BANKN1 , LV_BANKA , V_BANKA.
CONCATENATE LV_BANKA 'BANK' INTO LV_BANKA SEPARATED BY SPACE.
AND BEGDA BETWEEN PNBEGDA AND PNENDDA.
AND ENDDA BETWEEN PNBEGDA AND PNENDDA.
AND BEGDA BETWEEN PNBEGDA AND PNENDDA.
AND ENDDA BETWEEN PNBEGDA AND PNENDDA.
SELECT SINGLE VORNA FROM PA0002 INTO W_ENAME WHERE PERNR EQ
SELECT SINGLE NACHN FROM PA0002 INTO INITS WHERE PERNR EQ
* MESSAGE ID SY-MSGID TYPE SY-MSGTY NUMBER SY-MSGNO
CLEAR : LV_TITNAME , LV_TITLE , W_PLBL , W_SLBL, W_CLBL,
W_PL1 , W_PL2 , W_SL1 , W_SL2 , W_CL1 , W_CL2,
CLEAR : W_PLBL , W_SLBL , W_CLBL , W_PL1 , W_PL2 , W_SL1 , W_SL2 , W_CL1 , W_CL2, LV_TITLE.

item.TDLINE: <B>No 76, A/1, 11th Cross Street, Ambattur Industrial Estate,</>
<B>No 76, A/1, 11th Cross Street, Ambattur Industrial Estate,</>

CODE.item: IF WA_P0000-BEGDA BETWEEN PNBEGDA AND PNENDDA OR WA_P0000-ENDDA BETWEEN PNBEGDA AND PNENDDA.
W_LGTXT = 'LTA Arrears'. " Added By Govind On 03-03-2015 for LTA Arrears
W_LGTXT = 'TDS Refund'. " Added By Govind On 07-04-2015
*-- To stop the addition of deduction WT in Actual Total--*
**** MESSAGE ID SY-MSGID TYPE SY-MSGTY NUMBER SY-MSGNO
**** MESSAGE ID SY-MSGID TYPE SY-MSGTY NUMBER SY-MSGNO
*** LOOP AT IT_P0001_PAY INTO WA_P0001_PAY WHERE BEGDA GT BEGDA1.
**** MESSAGE ID SY-MSGID TYPE SY-MSGTY NUMBER SY-MSGNO
*** LOOP AT IT_INDIRECT INTO WA_INDIRECT WHERE LGART = WA_RT-LGART.
IF WA_DEDUC-BETRG LT 0 AND ( WA_DEDUC-LGART NE '/460'
ELSEIF WA_DEDUC-BETRG GT 0 AND ( WA_DEDUC-LGART EQ '9OTD' ).
W_LGTXT = 'Variable pay Ded'. "Variable pay Deduction Added By Govind On 03-mar-2015
W_LGTXT = 'Loan Repayment'. "Loan repayment Added By Govind On 31-jn-2015
DATA: WA_INTER_V0 LIKE LINE OF RESULT-INTER-V0.
DATA: WA_INTER_RT LIKE LINE OF RESULT-INTER-RT.
LOOP AT IT_0045 INTO WA_0045 WHERE SUBTY = WA_INTER_V0-VINFO(4)

<B>*COMPUTER GENERATED PAYSLIP NO NEED FOR AUTHORISED SIGNATURE</>

CODE.item: *!WARN IF TAKE HOME FROM /560 ( CLUSTER DATA ) IS NOT EQUAL TO TAKE HOME CALCULATED IN SMARTFORM
*!Clear all structures for every pernr loop.
CLEAR : LV_TITNAME , LV_TITLE , W_PLBL , W_SLBL, W_CLBL,
W_PL1 , W_PL2 , W_SL1 , W_SL2 , W_CL1 , W_CL2,
